data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Chumphon.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chumphon, Thailand

data.prayer: Father, help the 3,311 believers in Chumphon to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Chumphon, Thailand.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Chumphon to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Deaf people might believe through him.
Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Chumphon who will make disciples who make disciples.
Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Chumphon, Thailand will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 3,311 believers in the state of Chumphon.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

location.name: Chumphon
location.people_groups_list: Japanese, Chong, Han Chinese, Cantonese, Nyaw, Bisu
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Japanese (71,000), Chong (2,000), Han Chinese, Cantonese (40,000), Nyaw (18,000), Bisu (700)
